content: an exercise in strategic increasing and decreasing after many many attempts countless times frogging reworking and miscounting stitches i finally got a shape i liked dittos are my second favourite mon because they try so hard makes you wanna give em a big squishy hug instructions include a variation for making an amigurumi/cushion if you are attempting this instead of a hat it may be a good idea to use smaller needles than recommended for the yarn you are using i ve checked the stitch counts twice but if you spot any mistakes please let me know i ll try to fix it when i get a spare moment stitches used k k2tog s1 k1 psso m1r m1l grafting by kitchener stitch running stitch
